summary: chore(dependencies): Lock all dependencies in pyproject.toml
description: Lock all Python dependencies with exact versions. Pin structlog requests python-dotenv psycopg2-binary. Run poetry lock. Test in fresh container.

summary: fix(schema): Align ingestion_log schema with master_ingest.py
description: Update logging function to match ingestion_log table schema. Change to use series_id status records_inserted instead of source_series_id.

summary: chore(data): Clean invalid FRED series + Add Valet automation
description: Remove 6 invalid FRED series. Add Bank of Canada Valet API automation. Update master_ingest.py for Valet. Test full run.

summary: feat(automation): Migrate daily ingestion to pgCron
description: Replace OS cron with PostgreSQL pg_cron extension. Install pg_cron. Create job function. Schedule daily 6am UTC. Migrate existing jobs.

summary: chore(tooling): Install and configure GitHub CLI
description: Install gh CLI in dev container. Configure auth. Test PR creation from terminal. Add to Dockerfile.
Document Sprint 2 in Confluence and local markdown. Include achievements metrics lessons learned. Calculate velocity.

summary: epic(business-ops): Email infrastructure migration and CRM setup
description: Migrate email from Zoho to Google Workspace. Set up HubSpot CRM. Regain DNS control. Professional email for client outreach.

summary: spike(dns): Investigate BlueHost admin access and DNS control
description: Regain BlueHost access. Document DNS records. Assess Cloudflare migration. 2 hour timebox.

summary: feat(email): Migrate to Google Workspace Business Starter
description: Purchase Google Workspace. Verify domain. Configure MX SPF DKIM DMARC. Test deliverability. Import Zoho data.

summary: feat(crm): Set up HubSpot CRM free tier
description: Create HubSpot account. Connect Gmail. Define deal stages. Import contacts. Configure pipeline. Install Chrome extension.
Write 3 email sequences for cold outreach. Cold intro follow-up re-engagement. Save in HubSpot. A/B test variants.
Use dig to document all DNS records. Store in Confluence local markdown and 1Password. Create recovery procedure.

summary: feat(tooling): Integrate Mermaid to Excalidraw workflow
description: Install Mermaid CLI. Create workflow for converting .mmd to SVG to Excalidraw. Document in /docs/workflows/.

summary: feat(tooling): Create VS Code timestamp snippet
description: Add timestamp snippet to VS Code. Keybinding Ctrl+Shift+T. Works in markdown files.

summary: spike(automation): Jira API bulk ticket creation system
description: Build Jira ticket auto-creation from CSV catalog. Mimics FRED pattern. Test with pending tickets. ROI under 1 week.
